title: Does 52 sheep horses need new houses because of COVID-19?
subtitle: The allegation that dozens of horses are to be slaughtered if their adopters are not found in the near future is inaccurate and far from history.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Of the total number of horses whose owner died from COVID-19, 52 were to be slaughtered if its adopters were not found soon.
